attributes.action: immediately deport all failed asylum seekers without giving them leave to appeal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many bogus asylum seekers in this country, who have no claim to be here, i.e. they come from safe countries.  These people are a drain on our welfare and medical systems.  They offer nothing in return, but take a lot.  If their claim is found to be invalid they should be deported immediately to their own country without any appeal case being undertaken, thus wasting more of the tax-payers money.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
